page.title: 18VILLAGE ORGANISATIONS
page.content: {Harthill Carnival}has just happened, on July 13th.The Parents Association won first prize for their float (decorated lorry). The Carnival Society does other things through the year, like the{Bonfire}and the {Christmas decorations}in the main street. The{W.I.}is for the ladies in the village, and some ladies also play in a{netball}team. Harthill has a {cricket}team which practises on a Tuesday night.There are also{cubs, {brownies, scouts and guides}in Harthill. Every Tuesday night there is a{Youth Club}in the Welfare Hall.Once a year there is a{Mediaeval Market}in the churchyard.For young children there is a{Playgroup}and a{Mother and {Toddler Group.
